title: The Yoga Place Garden Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out
description: As of December 2014, the first vegetarian restaurant on Gili. Located in a yoga center. Offers big full meal salads washed in clean water, pure juices, and a wide selection of vegetarian and vegan dishes. Outdoor seating is in a peaceful green garden on the hillside overlooking Gili Trawangan. Located away from the tourist destinations, but only 5 minutes walking distance from the night market. The entire complex is built from old houses and boats so is eco friendly.
streetAddress: Jl Ikan Pelatuk - Sunset Forest Road, Lombok
